snippet.title: Farewell North - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Restore color to a desolate world in Farewell North!

►►► Wishlist today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432850/Farewell_North/

····················································································

Restore color to the desolate islands of Farewell North, an open world journey where you play as a collie traveling with his owner. Explore land and sea, uncover hidden paths, evade monsters, and free wildlife to bring color back to the world while revealing an emotional story about saying farewell.

Farewell North Original Score by John Konsolakis: www.johnkonsolakis.eu

····················································································

Follow the Development at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lh6euzByUD0&list=PLQSkcOhLbkkarcJ4t4eBMcl6UlIDI4DbV

····················································································

MORE LINKS:

• https://twitter.com/MooneyeStudios
• https://twitter.com/kylewbanks
• https://www.tiktok.com/@mooneyestudios

https://farewell-north.com/
https://www.mooneyestudios.com/
